title: Calories in a Krispy Kreme Donut
meta_description: Discover calories in krispy kreme donut, including macros like carbs, fat, protein, plus tweaks and FAQs for the classic Original Glazed.
h1: Calories in a Krispy Kreme Donut
assumptions: Original Glazed Krispy Kreme donut (~52 g), fresh from the store, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by donut type, freshness, location, and customizations; check Krispy Kreme's site or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Original Glazed Krispy Kreme donut contains 190 kcal and 10 g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Krispy Kreme Original Glazed donut?
What are the carbs in a Krispy Kreme donut?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is there fiber in Krispy Kreme donuts?
faqs.a: Minimal, around 0.5 g per Original Glazed donut.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Krispy Kreme donut?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do Krispy Kreme donuts have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in the Original Glazed.
